archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.4.7a: a) identifying what to do in unusual circumstances (e.g. if backups are not available, operational and IT infrastructure, services and environments need to be restored or technology has been compromised)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
